summary: Human Capital Business Partner with progressive experience in talent acquisition and onboarding, performance management processes, employee relations, HR consulting and culture transformation. Dependable and organized team player with the ability to communicate effectively and efficiently. Skilled at building relationships with employees across all levels of an organization. Specialties: HR Business Partnering, Psychometrics, Talent Acquisition.

profile_positions.location: Cape Town, Western Cape, South Africa
profile_positions.description:
This role is accountable for the translation of the Human Capital and the Servicing business strategy into the Talent Acquisition strategy for the segment. The role focuses on driving the development and implementation of processes and technologies for the purposes of Talent Acquisition in order to meet business demand in line with Central HC strategy, legislative requirements and transformation plans. Led the execution of the Talent Acquisition strategy across Capability Cluster segment in collaboration with Central HC and Human Capital Business Partners and ensures integration with other Human Capital practices. Managed a team of TA specialists.

Responsible for alignment between the Segment Strategy, the HC Strategy and the Talent Acquisition Strategy.
Developed a comprehensive Talent Acquisition strategy, driving employer branding, automation of processes, talent attraction, early career and graduate recruitment, sourcing optimization and candidate experience.
Drive innovation and integration of Talent Acquisition processes through technology. Implementation and introduction of Workday technology and processes in the day-to-day operations of the Talent Acquisition division. 
Ensure alignment and integration of Talent Acquisition practices with other HC practices.
Build Talent Acquisition capability across CC, primarily through HC Business Partners and Line Managers, in order to achieve and continually improve Talent Acquisition outcomes, contributing to building key capabilities and delivery of strategic objectives.
Contribute to a culture of data driven talent decisions throughout the Talent Acquisition spectrum, supporting CC objectives to attract and select high performing, value-aligned employees.
profile_positions.title: Talent Acquisition and Assessment Lead

profile_positions.description:
This role provides input into BU and Segment People Plan with the core focus being on developing and implementing tactical HR people plans to drive organisation effectiveness. This role partners with Senior Management teams and is responsible for the implementation HR plans and advisory services. Manage a small team of HR Professionals.

Role Description:
Provide input into BU or Segment People plan.
Developed and implemented tactical and operational people plans in response to business and people challenges.
Partnered with Senior Management teams to advise on people challenges and on how to improve people performance of teams.
Advised on people priorities for the future, using insights from HR Analytics and trends.
Managed the efficient implementation of the HR Calendar.
Developed and implemented tactical organisational development and effectiveness interventions to address short term business needs.
Advised Senior Management teams on improving employee engagement at all levels and on building a high performance culture align to overall segment plan.
Managed the implementation of the Segment. Talent and Leadership plan for designated area.
Advised Senior Management teams on how to respond to change efficiently and effectively.
Managed the adherence to HR controls and implement new controls as required.
Managed adherence to transformation plans for the segment.
Contributed to HR synergies across OM.
profile_positions.title: Human Capital Business Partner

profile_positions.description:
Deliver efficient and integrated Human Resources and recruitment solutions that meet the current and future needs of business, ensuring Human Resources services, as well as regulatory compliance, are achieved on an on-going basis. Actively assist in the implementation of organisational change through the facilitation and co-ordination of change initiatives to bring about performance and cultural improvement.

Principle Responsibilities:
Provide Human Resource consultation to assigned BU's across the organisation and be instrumental in facilitating and implementing agreed deliverables.
These business deliverables are aligned to Business Strategy/ HR Strategy with consultants collaborating to develop and implement best practice HR programs, policies and systems that support the organisation’s leaders and managers in managing their units and meeting their strategic priorities.
Through diverse attraction, recruitment and retention, I was responsible to ensure that current skill openings are filled with talent.
Provide comprehensive assessment support and feedback to assigned Business units, to guide the creation of a productive and consistent workforce.
HR processes and procedures utilised to add value to the overall organisational growth. This would include feedback to business with regards to culture surveys, development of interventions, change management support and project management.
Assist management in positioning performance management as a strategic management tool within the business.
Ensure that the organisation’s practices are in accordance with human resource policies and labour laws.
profile_positions.title: HR Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Provide an effective Recruitment and Selection Service to line management, from conceptualising and understanding the role through to assisting with selection decisions; ensure compliance with relevant organisational processes and labour legislation.
Advise line and staff on Employee Relations issues, implement and coordinate disciplinary and grievance resolution processes and assist with consultation processes as required, ensuring compliance with relevant legislation.
Co-ordinate all payroll input documentation on a monthly basis, including documentation related to new employees and terminations, salary adjustments, changes to benefits, and any other instructions which have an impact on the monthly payroll; ensure all necessary authorizations have been obtained before submission to payroll, and that information is accurate and complete. 
Co-ordinate the implementation of the bi-annual performance review exercise for designated units and advise Line Management on processes/issues involved.
Identify training needs in designated units and provide feedback to Line Management with regard to training requirements and suitable training providers; co-ordinate training interventions as required.
Assist the Divisional People Manager/People Manager with aspects of Employment Equity and Skills Development Reporting, which could include maintaining accurate records, facilitating forums, collating of data, education of line managers and employees etc.
Assist the People Manager with monthly reports as and when required.
Ensure general People Management administration is completed accurately and timeously, through effective time management or delegation to People Management Assistant as appropriate.
Conduct exit interviews to facilitate analysis of retention trends.
Assist with the onboarding of new employees, including induction programmes, documentation etc.
Implement and communicate wellness programmes and ensure that Health and Safety policies are applied.
profile_positions.title: HR Practitioner

profile_positions.description:
Recruitment and Selection
Work profiles are utilized for selection purposes.
Advertisements are compiled and placed in relevant media according to Medi-Clinic policies and standards.
Semi-structured, competency based, selection interviews as well as exit interviews are conducted.
Unsuccessful candidates are administered according to Medi-Clinic standards.
Digital Recruitment Manager (DRM) recruitment system is continuously administered.
Appointment letters for all new employees are compiled and administered.
All new employees are orientated and evaluated within first three months of employment.
Comprehensive personnel file for each employee is continuously maintained.
Timeous coordination and administration of appointments and resignations is ensured.
Personnel and Payroll Related Administration
Payroll inputs are accurately captured.
Inputs of leave system are compared and correlate with Time and Attendance System.
Complete Personnel files are administered on a confidential basis.
Monthly documents are completed and distributed to retirement fund and medical aid about personnel movements or change in details in accordance with personnel procedure manual.
Employee Medical Aid changes are administered on the Dynamic Member Administration (DMA) system.
Pension fund, retirement fund and medical aid inputs are accurate, correct and reconciled on a monthly basis.
Advances granted according to Medi-Clinic Human Resources Policy.
Increases are administered according to Medi-Clinic Human Resources Policy.
Leave and absenteeism are continuously managed.
Head Office payroll input is accurate and correct.
Payroll queries are handled timeously.
Industrial & Employee Relations
Company Labour Relations policies and procedures are followed.
Employees are advised regarding Industrial Relations issues.
Head of Departments are advised regarding Industrial Relations issues.
Disciplinary processes (including disciplinary interviews, disciplinary hearings, poor work performance hearings
